Venezuela's Maduro says election deal with opposition could collapseVenezuelan President Nicolas Maduro warned on Thursday that a deal with the political opposition for elections to be held later this year was in danger of collapse, after what he has described as "conspiracies" against him. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 02:47:38 GMT H5GTTVC3KRKL7OYOMTMSUIDA4Y https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/venezuela-maduro-says-election-deal-with-opposition-could-collapse-2024-01-26/Reuters世界美洲
Thousands protest Australia Day holiday with 'Invasion Day' ralliesMany Indigenous Australians, who make up 3.8% of the country's 26 million people, reject the holiday as marking the start of injustices suffered since European colonisation. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 02:22:52 GMT XNHKGJ3TJVPJBP65PQ32NC5FGM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/thousands-protest-australia-day-holiday-with-invasion-day-rallies-2024-01-26/Reuters世界亚太地区
White House's Sullivan to meet with China's foreign minister in BangkokU.S. National Security Advisor Jake Sullivan will meet with Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi in Bangkok on Friday and Saturday, building on a commitment by the two countries' leaders to deepen dialogue between the world's two largest economies. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 02:02:19 GMT FRSXZQ3CWZPP5IQLNVQGJHH3UQ https://www.reuters.com/world/white-houses-sullivan-meets-with-chinas-foreign-minister-bangkok-2024-01-26/Reuters世界
Israel braces for World Court ruling, focuses attack on south GazaU.N. judges in The Hague will rule on Friday whether to order Israel to suspend its military campaign in Gaza as officials push ahead with efforts to negotiate a new deal for a ceasefire and release of more Israeli hostages. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 01:50:18 GMT AT3C3DCZKBITXNH4EPI4SF3SAI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-braces-world-court-ruling-focuses-attack-south-gaza-2024-01-26/Stephanie Van Den Berg, Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Maayan Lubell世界中东地区
US, South Africa discuss Gaza war ahead of ruling on measures in genocide caseU.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken spoke on Thursday with South African Foreign Minister Naledi Pandor about the war in Gaza, a day ahead of a ruling at the World Court on urgent measures in a case in which Israel is accused of genocide. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 01:43:05 GMT UJKLKSBDRNNZLP3XWBWQW2EV7A https://www.reuters.com/world/us-south-africa-discuss-gaza-war-ahead-ruling-measures-genocide-case-2024-01-26/Kanishka Singh世界
Philippines posts $4 bln trade deficit in December, four-month lowThe Philippines posted a trade deficit of $4.01 billion for December, its narrowest gap in four months, government data showed on Friday. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 01:17:59 GMT UXYABHROMNNFNDGBECUG3Q62ZU https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/philippines-posts-4-bln-trade-deficit-december-four-month-low-2024-01-26/Reuters市场亚洲市场
New Zealand withdraws bill allowing 16-year-olds to vote in local body electionsThe New Zealand government on Friday withdrew a bill that would have allowed sixteen year olds to vote in local government elections if it had passed. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 01:13:32 GMT QWK4EGQIRFN2ZFBUPMX6MNP6XQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/new-zealand-withdraws-bill-allowing-16-year-olds-to-vote-in-local-body-elections-2024-01-26/Lucy Craymer世界亚太地区
Exclusive: China presses Iran to rein in Houthi attacks in Red Sea, sources sayChinese officials have asked their Iranian counterparts to help rein in attacks on ships in the Red Sea by the Iran-backed Houthis, or risk harming business relations with Beijing, four Iranian sources and a diplomat familiar with the matter said. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 01:02:44 GMT V72J672MHRL2DLBVEDQ2YSLH5Y https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/china-presses-iran-reigns-houthi-attacks-red-sea-sources-say-2024-01-26/Parisa Hafezi, Andrew Hayley世界中东地区
Belarus investigates some 20 analysts over 'harming national security'Authorities in Belarus, Russia's closest ally, launched an investigation on Thursday into a group of 20 independent analysts and commentators now outside the country and accused of conspiring to seize power and promote extremism. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 00:30:45 GMT CYR5ASAGBFOSNMGXQQB7N5ERKI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/belarus-investigates-some-20-analysts-over-harming-national-security-2024-01-26/Ronald Popeski, Kanishka Singh世界欧洲
World Court to rule on urgent measures in Gaza genocide caseU.N. judges on Friday will rule on South Africa's request for emergency measures against Israel, which is accused at the World Court of state-led genocide for its military operation in Gaza. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 00:04:05 GMT CMYIWSZOPBICLK7Q4OSRCOEKUY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/world-court-rule-urgent-measures-gaza-genocide-case-2024-01-26/Reuters世界中东地区
Mexico high schoolers take up arms after village kidnappingsArmed with rifles and sticks, and with their faces covered, boys and girls paraded around the local sports field before joining a patrol in Ayahualtempa, a mountain village in the southwestern state of Guerrero. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 23:24:45 GMT AJPOJDWMVVJVJP46S5M554SIE4 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mexico-high-schoolers-take-up-arms-after-village-kidnappings-2024-01-25/Javier Verdin, Diego Oré世界美洲
